resources.string: App\'s author name is Grzegorz Skoraczynski.
App is fetching constant data from Perseus server. It may take some time. Stay tune, next startups will take shorter!
There was a problem with internet connection. Please find more internet on your devide and press button.
Unfortunately Perseus server crashed or app encountered problem with internet connection. Please remember that Perseus API is still in beta version and frequently does not provide correct responses.

Unfortunately Perseus server crashed or app encountered problem with internet connection and app is unable to show this text chunk - please try with another. Please remember that Perseus API is still in beta version and frequently does not provide correct responses.
